body:
Hello everyone! I'm Likoluc.
I am an active player from overcast who now joined avicus, but I still dont know how to do somethings in the website :/, and you also wont find me too much in game because I dont have that time for play 2 servers :# :3.
Well AMA :D

title: Hey, I'm Lik

Welcome :)
